location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map Illustrating the Two Differing Lines of the Turco-Persian Frontier at Muhammerah

mods.abstract: Map showing the boundary line for the Turco-Persian Frontier at Muhammerah [Khorramshahr] as agreed by the mediating commissioners in 1850 and the boundary line as it is locally recognised. The mediating commissioners' line is marked as a red line, and the locally agreed boundary is marked with a black dotted line.The map was produced by Lieutenant Arnold Talbot Wilson and was compiled from plane table surveys undertaken in 1909.Lithographed by Harrison and Sons, London.
